name: Cabbage and Celery Casserole
author: Annita Layton
instructions: Cook vegetables in salted waster until crunchy. Drain and mix vegetables. Butter casserole. Layer half of the vegetables, half the soup (may need more), half the cheese and sprinkle with salt and pep- per. Repeat with another layer of vegetables, soup, seasoning, and cheese. Top with buttered bread crumbs (French fried onion may be used for topping). Bake at 350Â° for 45 minutes.
